name: Hammer Harold: Dead End Dig
description:
Hammer Harold and Marsha go on a journey to learn more about his origins. To uncover the truth behind Origin Harold's disappearance while exploring the Haroldverse.

☆ ABOUT ☆

"Hammer Harold: Dead End Dig" was developed in a month for the "Dark Universe" Game Jam. The story and character designs were inspired by 90's Anime.  The game itself is an experimental mix of Puzzle and Exploration elements.

Note: This current build is Prototype Demo version. 

☆ GAMEPLAY ☆

The gameplay is a combination of puzzle and exploration. Harold uses his Hama Hammer to smash through rocks and obstacles to reach the 'Dead Ends' of each stage.

☆ HOW TO PLAY ☆

The Z Key - Smash rocks and jump over gaps.

Arrow Keys - Move Harold up, down, left or right 

Note: The Keyboard Configuration can be changed in the Options menu.
